exp_table.h File Reference

This definition file contains the variable definitions and look up macro for the table of exp(-x) exp_vec (a GLOBAL VARIABLE). More...

#include "gas_mort.h"
#include "gas_mort_params.h"
#include "reach_gas_specs.h"

#include <math.h>

Detailed Description

This definition file contains the variable definitions and look up macro for the table of exp(-x) exp_vec (a GLOBAL VARIABLE).

Relevant range for exp(-x) is roughly 0 to 5; Beyond that exp(-x) is essentially 1 or 0 respectively.

An Increment of 0.01 in the x variable is enough to guarantee that the roundoff error for using this table is within 0.01 of the actual value for exp(-x).

Before the first call of LOOK_UP_NEXP() the function make_exp_vec must be called.
